To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private BollingerBands _bb;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_bb = BB(symbol, period, k);

// In OnData()
if (_bb.IsReady)
{
    var standardDeviation = _bb.StandardDeviation.Value;
    var middleBand = _bb.MiddleBand.Value;
    var upperBand = _bb.UpperBand.Value;
    var lowerBand = _bb.LowerBand.Value;
    var bandWidth = _bb.BandWidth.Value;
    var percentB = _bb.PercentB.Value;
    var price = _bb.Price.Value;
    var current = _bb.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.bb = self.BB(symbol, period, k)

# In OnData()
if self.bb.IsReady:
    standard_deviation = self.bb.StandardDeviation.Value
    middle_band = self.bb.MiddleBand.Value
    upper_band = self.bb.UpperBand.Value
    lower_band = self.bb.LowerBand.Value
    band_width = self.bb.BandWidth.Value
    percent_b = self.bb.PercentB.Value
    price = self.bb.Price.Value
    current = self.bb.Current.Value
